alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Franklin; Madison; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 10:54PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Morehouse, East Carroll, northwestern Madison, Richland, West Carroll and northern Franklin Parishes through MIDNIGHT CST... At 1054 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gassoway to near Monroe. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Millikin around 1100 PM CST. Rayville around 1120 PM CST. Archibald around 1125 PM CST. Holly Ridge around 1135 PM CST. Delhi and Bakers around 1150 PM CST. Waverly and Tendal around 1200 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Baskin, Kilbourne, Forest, Pioneer, Oak Ridge and Epps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas...northeastern Louisiana...and west central Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Franklin; Madison; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll
